analysis.swing_levels: SPY swing range: $670 (active support) to $700 (call wall). Breach above $700 targets dormant resistance at $730 (48k OI, 5.7%). Breach below $670 targets $645 (126k OI, 6.6% dormant support). QQQ swing range: $625 (active resistance) to $590 (dormant put wall). Max pain gravity at $687 (SPY) and $620 (QQQ) suggests range consolidation likely through expiration. Swing traders should monitor whether post-holiday volume return validates bullish breakout or confirms bearish breakdown.
